featured.text: Furthermore, watching horror movies can disturb sleep patterns, as the residual fear and anxiety they evoke may keep people awake all night, thus leading to fatigue and irritability the following day.
When asked what color is evoked by a letter or number, synesthetic people would persistently give the same answer even if tested months or years apart.

definition.en_def: to bring a feeling, memory, or image into your mind
definition.example: The song can evoke memories of my childhood.
